description.en-US: Configure your browser with a free video converter tool and custom web search by installing the Video Converter World & Custom Web Search extension. Quick video conversion: The online video converter tool lets you convert videos effortlessly to popular formats like MP4, MOV, FLV, WEBM, MKV, and AVI. Get instant video conversion with uncompromised quality, enhance file compatibility, and make your files easy to share. Custom search: Search from any search box on your browser and get results including top news stories, weather information, images, videos and more with Yahoo® as the default search provider. How to convert a video: 1.Click the Video Converter World & Custom Web Search icon on your browser toolbar to open a new tab 2.Upload or drag and drop a file into the widget 3.Once the file is uploaded, select a format from the dropdown menu and start converting the file 4.Download the converted file We welcome your ideas and suggestions to improve this extension. Please note that you can uninstall the extension if you are dissatisfied with the product. Upon clicking the button above, you confirm that you have read & agree to the Terms of Service & Privacy Policy and consent to install this extension. Yahoo is a registered trademark of Apollo Global Management, Inc. Video Converter World & Custom Web Search is a product offered by Innover Group. We provide users with ease of access to information and widgets from their browser. Our Privacy Policy is important for us to continue providing the users with the best possible all-round experience. Here’s a summary of user data that our add-on collects and how we use this information: 1. IP address: We collect your IP address when you use the conversion tool offered by our extension. We anonymise your IP address and do not trace it back to you. We only use this information for analytics and reporting purposes. You can opt-out of sharing the above information with us, however, you will only be able to access limited features. 2. Technical data: Technical information (such as domain name, consent status, install date and user agent )is also collected by the add-on to plan product upgrades and help with fraud detection. This data is not personally identifiable and is used for optimization purposes and cannot be used to identify users. 3. Information you explicitly share with us: We may collect information that you may choose to provide us (such as your name, telephone number and/or email address) if submitted by you as part of a feedback form, crash report, enhancement suggestion or other communication from you to us. This information is only used to respond to user queries or concerns and will not be shared with any third party. Privacy Policy: https://videoconverterworld.com/videoconverter/terms/privacypolicy_ff.html Terms of Service: https://videoconverterworld.com/videoconverter/terms/termsofservice_ff.html

name.en-US: Video Converter World & Custom Web Search

summary.en-US: Add the Video Converter World & Custom Web Search extension to convert videos via an online video converter tool by clicking the favicon on the toolbar & enjoy Yahoo® search from your browser.
